X.i.6.F.2.b
.
Disabilities That Require Examination for IDES Purposes
VA examinations are generally required for
all
referred
disabilities on the
VA Form 21-0819
, and
all
claimed
disabilities on a
VA Form 21-526EZ
that was returned during an initial IDES meeting.
Exceptions
:
Do not provide an examination for
dental conditions that are not subject to service connection (SC) under
38 CFR 4.150
, or
disabilities that were recently examined by VA as provided in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.F.2.c
.
Provide examinations only under the conditions specified in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.G.1
for
previously denied conditions, and
issues on appeal or review.
References
:Â  For more information on
claims for dental treatment, see
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 4
, and
dental/oral contentions for which compensation-purpose SC may not be established, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 14.1.c
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Development and Examinations
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F
